description.value:
Choose Climb or Swim. You have an edge on tests made using that skill.

As a maneuver, you can channel the power of wind or water. If you pick wind, you can fly for a number of rounds equal to your Presence score. If you pick water, you can swim at full speed until the end of the encounter. When you use this perk, you canâ€™t use it again until you earn 1 or more Victories or complete a respite.
